title: Information Technology and Communication (IT/COMs) Senior Engineer
description: job description: job summary: the role of information technology and communication (it/coms) senior engineer is expected to support the chief engineer and the it/coms lead with it/coms domain activities related to the life cycle of a large integrated system, deployed at a national level. this system life cycle includes concepts, requirements, design, implementation, verification, deployment, validation, acceptance and maintenance/support. it involves also interaction with the customer and end-user. the role reports to the head of engineering (chief engineer) and the it/coms lead engineer. the role is based in riyadh, but frequent travel to locations in saudi arabia is required. occasional international travel is also expected. person specifications: 10+ years of diverse hands on experience in information technology infrastructure systems and platforms including networking, security, database, hyper converged systems, san solutions, backup & restore, , system management (e.g. deployment & provisioning, monitoring), data center solutions, etc. advanced knowledge of microsoft product technology and architectures have extensive experience in designing and managing microsoft windows servers systems advanced knowledge with microsoft active directory services including dns, dhcp, and dfs. advanced microsoft virtualization services (hyper-v) - virtual machines and containers advanced microsoft public key infrastructure and microsoft exchange knowledge advanced knowledge of microsoft system center suite (sccm, scom, scdpm, scvmm, scorch) knowledge of other virtualization technologies are welcomed (e.g. kvm, rhel, vmware) knowledge of network design, deployment and administration knowledge of the cisco technology (switching and routing) knowledge of containerization technologies (e.g kubernetes, openshift, rancher) hands-on experience with continuity of operations/disaster recovery architecture and planning. ability to work in diverse cultural and challenging professional environments analytical thinking and strong engineering mindset. ability to work under pressure and to deadlines strong listening skills (to understand customer requirements) strong service orientation and on-time delivery focus cost, quality and time sensitiveness team player and cooperative solution oriented flexible (willingness to travel to remote sensor sites) bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, it, communication or any relevant field. excellent written, verbal and presentation skills; ability to effectively explain complex technical concepts. experience with it/coms systems essential to be fluent in written and spoken english desirable to be able to communicate in arabic benefitial qualifications and experience: have a strong engineering background working on large integration projects experience in working with direct interface to the customer have worked with a broad range of information technology systems e.g. networking, storage, server, virtualization, system/network administration etc. detailed experience in relevant information technology and communication solutions. driving license key result areas & areas of accountability: develop parts of it and communication system design documents and specific artefacts (requirements, tests, etc) in collaboration with the itc team in europe. act as first poc for it/coms technical issues. develop and review it/coms documents (design, installation, administration and user manuals) develop and review system acceptance documents support system element acceptance in eu and saudi arabia all the activities are performed in alignment with the it/coms team in in europe support delivery in time, to quality and within cost of the it/coms system conduct workshops related to it/coms cfi (customer furnished items) related to swan, wan, voip, external if, it/coms security and it2/3. understanding the needs of stakeholders and conveying them to requirements and solutions, support other domains (e.g. do basic power and cooling calculations to support infra team) provide support to o&s (in service support) to resolve outstanding tickets assigned to engineering. technical procurement management (internal and external suppliers) for it/coms products. attend all project technical workshops related to it/coms develop layouts in visio develop detailed technical presentations support the handover and training activities to o&s department for it/coms components this job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth. company: airbus defence and space saudi limited employment type: fixed term - experience level: professional job family: chief engineering & architecture <jf-en-ea> by submitting your cv or application you are consenting to airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. this information will only be used by airbus. airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. we welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief. airbus is, and always has been, committed to equal opportunities for all. as such, we will never ask for any type of monetary exchange in the frame of a recruitment process. any impersonation of airbus to do so should be reported to emsom@airbus.com . at airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly. wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

name: AccorHotel
title: Engineering Coordinator
description: company description fairmont riyadh is luxurious five-star hotel where fairmont renowned brand embraces the local culture of saudi arabia. our luxury hotel located in the business gate complex with direct access to more than 60 corporates. fairmont riyadh is the nearest luxury hotel from king khaled international airport (riyadh airport) with an easy access to riyadh front, granada business park,“kafd” king abdullah financial district , riyadh international convention & exhibition center "ricec" & princess nora university. fairmont riyadh comprises of spacious 298 rooms and suites, selection of 5 world-class dinning options, convention center with 4,500 sqm of meeting spaces completed with sophisticated events and wedding facilities. the hotel features an array of lifestyle choices to men, offered by gentlemen’s tonic spa and fairmont riyadh fitness center including indoor pool. ladies are also invited to escape the routine and treat themselves with our ladies lounge; spa, pampering beauty salon and boutique gym. job description scope and objectives to coordinate between the engineering to ensure all maintenance activities are ensured on time and to coordinate with other departments to ensure all their engineering requirements are fulfilled and to monitor and prepare required reports on day to day basis to facilitates required action. specific job knowledge, skill and ability the individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation. managing general hotel gardens maintenance and for both the gardens and garden area including basic carpentry and minor painting and decorating. monitor the preventive maintenance file on daily basis and communicate to the team. documentation of preventive maintenance records assist the engineering store to update reports assist the team members to find records and documents from the engineering folders. prepare and maintain the engineering library and training room. organize and coordinate the department section meetings. document all training records. represent engineering department for meetings if advised. monitor and analyse the guest satisfaction reports concern to maintenance department. monitor the department team grooming issues and coordinate with section managers for improvements. monitor the department work safety issues and coordinate with section managers for improvements. documentation of work accidents and follow ups. coordinate with another department whenever assigned. communicate to the engineering team through documents about all the necessary information and daily basis. communicate and collect feedback from the team and report to the doe & adoe. coordinate all other maintenance requests/interventions with the departments concerned ensuring the right information are passed in a timely manner and interventions are done with minimal disturbances to operations. ensure good communication between engineering department and any other department. update engineering consumptions data's such as electricity, fuel, gas, water consumption and also swimming pools readings etc. on a daily basis and all records should be up to date and available at all times. assist engineers in preparing material requisitions for withdrawal from the main and engineering stores. qualifications qualification standards education high school graduate or equivalent required. at least 2-year college (associate) degree preferred. experience five years’ experience in the same field in hospitality.

name: AYEN
title: FCA (Facility Condition Assessment) & H&S (Health & Safety Assessment) Engineer
description: ayen | عاين is a real estate data solutions provider that enables clients to make informed decisions through innovative property data collection, processing, and visualization. our team of certified experts provide interactive professional reports to our clients, empowering them to make informed real estate decisions. role description we are seeking an experienced fca & h&s engineer to join our team. the primary responsibility of this role is to conduct facility condition assessments and health & safety assessments on various facilities. the engineer will be responsible for inspecting and evaluating the condition of buildings, identifying maintenance and repair needs, and ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations. requirements responsibilities: conduct facility condition assessments (fca) to evaluate the condition and performance of building systems and components. perform health & safety assessments (h&s) to identify potential hazards and ensure compliance with civil defence regulations. inspect facilities and document findings, including deficiencies, maintenance needs, and compliance issues. develop comprehensive assessment reports, including recommendations for maintenance and repair. collaborate with supervisors to understand the project-specific needs, requirements, and outcomes. stay up-to-date with standards, regulations, and best practices related to facility condition assessments and health & safety assessments. coordinate with superiors and other professionals to report about recommended improvements and repairs. ensure timely completion of assessment projects and deliver high-quality reports. qualifications: bachelor’s degree in engineering (architectural, structural or civil, mechanical, electrical, or h&s) professional certification or membership in relevant engineering organizations. prior experience conducting facility condition assessments and health & safety assessments. knowledge of building systems, including hvac, electrical, plumbing, and structural. familiarity with health and safety codes, and civil defence regulations. strong analytical and problem-solving skills. excellent written and verbal communication skills, in both arabic & english languages. ability to work independently and manage multiple projects. attention to detail and strong organizational skills. experience: 7+ years, not less than 5+ years within buildings & facilities ca, h&s. ability to relocate and commute to cities across the country, including rural areas with facilities to assess and reports to conduct. skills: extensive knowledge of facility condition assessment methodologies and tools. proficiency in conducting health & safety assessments and identifying hazards. ability to interpret and analyze technical data and reports. expertise in producing detailed assessment reports with clear recommendations. strong project management skills to ensure timely and accurate completion of assessments. collaboration and communication skills to work effectively with clients and cross-functional teams. knowledge of relevant software and tools for data collection and analysis.

title: Engineer, Loss Prevention
description: development, review and update occupational safety policies, procedures, activities and programs. conduct risk assessment and submit report to all concerned parties. ensure the completion of periodic inspection and maintenance of fire protection/firefighting equipment/system. collect data related to occupational safety needed for technical studies. assist in project evaluations and monitor contractor activities. maintain the copies of all standards, policies, procedure, instructions and studies and distribute to interested parties as required or needed. assist in preparing client’s safety pre-qualification requirements. assist in evaluating contractor/3rd party pre-qualification and safety performance. maintain personal protective equipment (ppe) quality by in conformance to niosh, ansi and/or equivalent standards or approvals. represent the company for insurance survey and/or during government entity inspection/visit facilitate periodic emergency drill. plan for activities and programs related to occupational safety and fire protection/prevention. conduct audit in periodic basis to verify compliance and maintenance of safety management system, programs and procedures. participate in incident/accident investigation. attend meeting relevant to loss prevention/occupational safety. keep records and data related to loss prevention/occupational safety. maintain inspection and maintenance records of firefighting/fire protection equipment/system

normally receives general direction/instructions on new assignments. conducts surveys to ascertain the locations of natural features and human-made structures on the earth's surface, underground, and underwater, using electronic distance-measuring equipment and other surveying instruments. operates and manages land-information computer systems, performs tasks such as storing data, making inquiries, and producing plots and reports. reviews information from survey teams regarding measurement of distances, directions, angles between points and elevation of points, lines, and contours on, above, and below the earth’s surface. researches legal records, looks for evidence of previous boundaries, and analyzes the data to determine the location of boundary lines. records the results of surveys, verifies the accuracy of data, and prepares plots, maps, and reports. an experienced professional with full understanding of area of specialization. works on complex problems of diverse name: BAE Systems

description: component paint technician salary: competitive grade: 8 location: taif, saudi arabia job purpose bae systems is the uk government’s nominated prime contractor under the government-to-government arrangements that are in place to provide equipment, support and training to saudi arabia. we provide maintenance of royal saudi air force (rsaf) aircraft and train rsaf and royal saudi naval force personnel safely in a training environment in how to use their aircraft, equipment and weapons. bae systems saudi arabia is committed to supporting the saudi arabian national agenda including saudisation and the training and development of saudi national capability through the growth of the saudi national partner companies thereby reinforcing industrialisation and partnerships. the job holder has responsibility for undertaking all surface finish activities associated with scheduled or unscheduled maintenance in support of typhoon operations in kingdom. job name: JASARA PMC
title: Senior Engineer Structural Shell & Core
description: neom – the line programme will grow and evolve and become the largest capital project world-wide. the programme aims to challenge the “status-quo” with the intention of delivering a real meaningful change such that neom is referenced as world class and world leader in numerous areas. neom – the line is a combination of multi-modules with each module representing a complex multi-discipline element of the overall programme with both standard, unique, and bespoke scope aspects. marina modules represent a “showcase” window of the neom – the line programme, being the key development interests of the line and neom as a whole. the overall planning and organization of the marina modules is aligned with the key anchor assets planned for these modules. such assets include a soccer stadium, museum, and university and many other, among other key facilities. each of these assets and the surrounding program is strategically located with consideration for the programmatic and performance demands of the asset type. the delivery of the anchor assets have the end-to-end responsibility for schedule, cost, and quality from the pre-construction stage duties to handover to meet current and future commitments and to maximize opportunities. a senior construction engineer specializing in the constructability of shell & core construction focuses on the essential structural and foundational elements of a building, typically before the interior finishes and details are added. the role purpose in the context of shell & core construction involves overseeing and engineering the construction and the sequence of activities of the designated scope. with the senior construction managers, the senior construction engineer should lead and coordinate the engineering of the construction during the life of the project and define the logistics requirements for the assigned scope, including lifting equipment, transport, handling and storing. the role should evolve with the progress of the works from a pre-construction/planning role to duties and obligations focused on construction management, t&c and contract administration once contractor/s is/are onboard. the package(s) of scope will be designated by the delivery director, these could be both standard and bespoke packages within the anchor assets program of the marina modules with high levels complexity and value in a fast-track environment. key responsibilities: analyze the design of the assigned assets and review these for constructability. produce, with the support of the senior construction managers, optimized construction methods and sequences for the assigned scope. get from the design information the necessary data to produce the construction methods, sequences and plans, engineering the construction methods. adopt sensible and reasonable assumptions when the full information is not available evaluating and recording the corresponding risks. extract from the construction methods the requirements to be exported to the design to assure the optimum constructability of the works. participate actively in the design meetings and workshops to get a deep and efficient level of coordination aiming an optimized design for construction without compromising the design intents and objectives. actively contribute to the identification, assessment and validation of the risks affecting the works within the scope. proposing adequate actions and mitigations reducing the neom risk exposure, in coordination with the risk management team, using risk management techniques, whilst enabling greater value to grow, improve and mature. calculate, in coordination with the planning team, the resources required to implement the corresponding construction methods and complete the works in the defined timeframes. anticipate and plan the resources needed for the construction management during the pre-construction and construction phases. lead and coordinate the engineering of the construction during the life of the project. ensure that the temporary works adhere to the requirements and regulations. define inspection and testing protocols for the construction equipment and temporary works to verify compliance with industry standards. contribute to cost estimation for shell & core construction activities and monitor expenses to stay within budget. identify cost-effective solutions without compromising structural integrity or safety. establish contingency plans to address unforeseen challenges or changes in project requirements. coordinate with his/her equivalents in other work packages for the prompt identification and optimized resolution of the interfaces between the works. contribute actively to the definition and implementation of the safety measures to safeguard the well-being of construction personnel and ensure compliance with safety regulations, working together with the safety, logistics, construction and lifting teams. contribute to the production of the necessary management plans and reports, including delivery, construction, qa/qc and safety. participate in the continuous improvement action plans including lessons learned and sharing any return of experience with other parts of the neom organization. mentor and accelerate the learning curve of the junior members of the team. requirements knowledge: advanced knowledge of construction management and technics of construction. good knowledge of planning, project controls, safety management and risk management. advanced knowledge on construction equipment and temporary works, including formworks, material transport and handling and lifting. good understanding of fast-track principles and process. basic knowledge in cost estimations. excellent knowledge and common-sense on all the activities on construction sites. skills: strong coordination backbone with collaborative management style and people management mindset. anticipation and proactive attitude. mid-term strategic thinking. good understanding of the construction constraints and priorities during the construction activities. capable of working within a multi discipline team, across multiple interfaces and complex stakeholders. open mind for modern methods of construction, new materials and innovation. able to handle all the various problems, issues, changes and emergencies that may arise within construction sites. ability to produce drawings, reports, calculations, specifications related with construction works. ability to operate in fast paced, pressured and changing environments, whilst being able to maintain clear decision making. ability to filter the information that is relevant and escalate it when necessary. ability to read and correctly interpret technical drawings, schematics, method of statements, inspections and test procedures, quality plans, and other construction related documentation. ability to use the usual software in the industry: windows, office, cad. anticipation and proactive attitude. mid-term strategic thinking focused. team-working mindset. experience: 15+ years of professional experience. used to work in complex matrix environments. experience in mega/giga projects in international environment and in middle east, in design&build or construction contracts at project/construction management level. experience in high rise and/or iconic high-end buildings would be valued. multidisciplinary architectural and engineering mind will be considered a plus. robust structural knowledge will be considered a plus. qualifications: a chartered civil or structural engineer or architectural degree is a must. project management accreditation is a plus.

name: Jacobs Engineering Group Inc.
title: Senior BIM Coordinator (Saudi National)
description: your impact: our people & places solutions business – reinforces our drive to improve the lives of people everywhere and epitomizes the "why" of what we do – the tremendous positive impact and value our solutions bring to our communities and society as a whole. from facilities delivering life-saving therapies and ensuring clean water to enabling the connection of people through all modes of transportation and providing access to technology – we're integrating a multitude of these solution elements to build the smart environments of tomorrow. start your jacobs career with a company that inspires and empowers you to deliver your best work so you can evolve, grow and succeed – today and into tomorrow. discover limitless opportunities in your career at jacobs. a world where you can! we welcome you to a transformative journey with jacobs, where your aspirations converge with a global network of the brightest minds, industry thought leaders, and market experts. at jacobs, we believe in the power of collective intelligence, fostering an environment where innovation thrives as we challenge today, to reinvent tomorrow. as a cornerstone of our company, you'll be part of a global community that values collaboration, continuous learning and diversity. our unwavering commitment aligns seamlessly with the kingdom's vision 2030, and as a strategic delivery partner, we play a critical role in supporting the creation of a prosperous future. join us in realizing our shared vision to create a more connected, sustainable world. at jacobs your talents will contribute to shaping this future, leaving a lasting impact on generations to come. welcome to jacobs, where your potential meets purpose. we are seeking a highly skilled and detail-oriented senior bim coordinator to join our dynamic team for an infrastructure project in saudi arabia. a bim coordinator is responsible for managing and coordinating the building information modeling (bim) process for construction projects. one of the key ingredients of this role is to ensure that all project stakeholders have access to accurate and up-to-date bim models and data throughout the project lifecycle. jacobs is construction supervision consultant for a multi-billion development mixed-use historic, culture and lifestyle destination. the project will be the kingdom’s historic and cultural heart, proudly showcasing to the world saudi arabia’s 300 years of history through an engaging and inspiring set of heritage, hospitality, education, retail and dining experiences for residents and visitors. it aims to be developed as an urban, mixed-use development inspired by the principles of both new urbanisms ensuring its main anchors rooted in its historic culture and heritage. ultimately, the destination will include museums, galleries, restaurants, retail experiences, public squares, hotels, multiple recreational spaces, residences, educational institutions and offices. responsibilities: design & coordination: collaborating with project teams to develop bim execution plans and standards. managing and coordinating the creation, modification, and distribution of bim models and data. conducting regular quality control checks on bim models and data to ensure accuracy and compliance with project requirements. assisting project teams in clash detection and resolution by identifying and resolving conflicts in bim models. facilitating collaboration and communication between different project stakeholders, such as architects, engineers, contractors, and owners. training and supporting project team members in the effective use of bim software and tools. keeping up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in bim technology and best practices. assisting in the development and implementation of bim-related workflows and processes. assisting in the preparation and coordination of bim-related documentation, such as bim project execution plans, bim standards, and model delivery requirements. participating in project meetings and providing bim-related updates and recommendations to project teams. data management: manage and organize files, ensuring proper version control and file naming conventions. create and maintain a comprehensive database of drawings and design files. quality assurance: perform quality checks on drawings to ensure accuracy, completeness, and adherence to project standards. revise and modify drawings as required based on feedback from project team members. documentation: prepare and maintain project documentation, including record drawings and as-built documentation. assist in the preparation of technical reports and presentations as needed. here’s what you’ll need: qualifications - recent previous experience (within last 5 years) in a bim role for major infrastructure projects that are complex in nature and are ideally located in the saudi region. bachelor’s degree in civil engineering or related field. proven experience as a bim coordinator or a bim specialist in civil engineering projects. strong understanding of civil engineering principles and practices. attention to detail and ability to produce accurate drawings. effective communication and collaboration skills. knowledge of relevant industry standards and regulations. familiarity with infrastructure projects in saudi arabia is a plus. jacobs first started work in the kingdom of saudi arabia in 1945, initially serving the oil and gas industry. over time, we have developed a diverse portfolio of services, providing custom strategic solutions across; social infrastructure, ports and maritime, energy and power, aviation, rail, water, built environment, digital technology, defence and strategic consulting. right now, the kingdom of saudi arabia is going through a period of unprecedented change as it seeks to transform its economy and society in line with vision 2030 — a bold blueprint to diversify its economy, develop its infrastructure, cherish its national identity and create a better life for all saudis, residents and tourists. we are committed to providing opportunities for saudi nationals from graduates to senior leaders, supporting the development of the national workforce and ensuring that our team reflects the diversity of the kingdom. our saudi employees contribute invaluable insights into the local context to better serve our customers and the communities in which we live and work. we aim to be fully compliant with saudisation / nitaqat, with over 50% of jacobs’ workforce in saudi arabia made up of nationals. don't miss out on this extraordinary opportunity to be at the forefront of progress. join us now and embrace a future where your talent will shine. jacobs. a world where you can.

name: Infinite pl
title: Product Manager - GIS
description: as a product manager specializing in gis, you will lead the technical vision, strategy, and development of our geospatial products portfolio. we are seeking a seasoned professional with a strong technical background in geospatial technology, gis, and a proven track record of successfully managing complex products within the geospatial domain. what you’ll do: develop and communicate a comprehensive technical product strategy aligned with the company's vision and industry trends. drive the evolution of geospatial technology products by incorporating cutting-edge technologies and staying abreast of emerging trends. define and prioritize technical features and requirements based on a deep understanding of geospatial technology, gis principles, and spatial data analytics. collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, providing clear technical specifications and guidance throughout the product development lifecycle. oversee the design and implementation of spatial data processing algorithms, ensuring efficient and accurate geospatial data handling. collaborate with data scientists and engineers to optimize algorithms for spatial analysis and processing large-scale geospatial datasets. define and manage apis for geospatial technology products, ensuring compatibility with industry standards and enabling seamless integration with third-party systems. collaborate with integration teams to develop and maintain connectors for popular gis platforms. establish and enforce geospatial data standards to ensure data consistency, accuracy, and interoperability. implement robust quality assurance processes to validate and maintain the integrity of geospatial datasets. create detailed technical documentation, including product specifications, api documentation, and technical user guides. provide training and support to internal teams and external stakeholders on the technical aspects of geospatial technology products. work closely with sales, marketing, and customer support teams to ensure technical alignment with market needs and customer requirements. collaborate with ux/ui designers to enhance the user experience of geospatial technology products. requirements: a bachelor's or master's degree in a relevant field such as computer science, gis, geomatics, etc. at least 12 of experience in a technical product management role within the geospatial technology industry. in-depth knowledge of geospatial technology, gis technologies, spatial data formats, and spatial analysis. proficient in programming languages such as python, java, or others for scripting, automation, and integration tasks. technical familiarity with gis sparkgeo- mapbox and gis esri (arcgis). familiarity with cloud platforms (aws, azure, google cloud) and geospatial data processing in a cloud environment. experience with agile development methodologies and working within a cross functional team environment. strong problem-solving and analytical skills. a key relationship builder that drives mutual value for their shareholders and customers alike.

name: ITT, Inc.
title: Project Engineer
description: position summary: process barepump / pump package order from various epc and end-user review, reconcile and define order requirement and understand all applicable specification. prepare rfq & pr (purchase requisition) for buy-outs per project requirement bom creation and upload to itt erp system review of internal (pump related documents) and buy-out documents (motor, coupling, mechanical seal, seal system, etc…) and ensure compliant to project and specification requirement. prepare engineering submittal (i.e. gad and auxiliary piping drawing in 2d and 3d, pump sectional drawing, wiring diagram, p&id, etc…) utilizing itt goulds cad software upload and download of submittal / internal documents to / from itt goulds data base interact to various goulds facility, global engineering, inter departments, customer and vendors throughout the progress of the project. interact and provide support to operation and necessary reference documents required for pump/pump package assembly. attend customer, vendor and inter-department meeting position requirements: degree in mechanical engineering 5 years’ experience with pumps and pump package. 3-5 years’ experience in cad modeling and documentation proficient with creo parametric 3d modeling/drawing creation and also with autocad familiar with asme y14.5 dimensioning and tolerancing, including gd&t knowledgeable of erplx system knowledgeable of aramco & sabic specifications and international standard such as api, asme & ansi. knowledgeable of pump package design / lay-out knowledgeable of driver equipment and its operation knowledgeable of api plan and sealing system and its operation knowledgeable of pump package’s instrumentation knowledgeable of chemical and oil & gas industry. ability to manage multiple tasks highly self-motivated, a willingness to make a difference and learn excellent communication skills and the ability to work with different engineering team members working knowledge of ms office products such as excel, word etc... strong design judgment. customer focused (internal and external) subject matter expertise and knowledge effective written communications skills team oriented and ability to foster team spirit and attitude prioritization and planning skills creating a positive work environment ability to identify hazard

name: النفيس القابضة
title: QA/QC Engineer
description: summary: we are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical qa/qc engineer to join our team and ensure the highest quality standards are met throughout our [products/services/processes]. you will be responsible for developing and implementing quality assurance plans, conducting inspections and tests, identifying and reporting non-conformances, and working collaboratively with other departments to improve quality. responsibilities: develop and implement comprehensive qa/qc plans for [products/services/processes]. conduct inspections and tests in accordance with established procedures and industry standards. analyze test results and identify deviations from specifications. document non-conformances and work with other departments to resolve them. develop and implement corrective and preventive actions (capas) to prevent future occurrences. participate in the development and revision of quality control procedures. maintain accurate and up-to-date quality records. train and mentor other team members on quality assurance procedures. stay abreast of relevant quality standards and regulations. qualifications: bachelor's degree in engineering, science, or a related field (preferred). minimum [2 years] of experience in quality assurance or quality control. strong understanding of quality management principles and practices, such as six sigma and lean manufacturing. excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. proficient in quality control software and data analysis tools. excellent communication and interpersonal skills. ability to work independently and as part of a team. strong attention to detail and a commitment to quality. نوع الوظيفة: دوام كامل ability to commute: الرياض (مطلوب) ability to relocate: الرياض: relocate before starting work (مطلوب) نوع الوظيفة: دوام كامل

name: IRCO
title: NETWORK ENGINEER
description: company : irco. experience : 3 to 5 years location : saudi arabia salary : 2500 sr - 3000 sr urgently required network engineers for irco (international road trading & maintenance co.) jizan saudi arabia network engineers please see below job description. please see below job description. basic requirement : education : bachelor of science , information technology (engineering ). must be familiar with lan(local area network) , wan(wide area network) & network infrastructure, fiber optic, msql data base expert, window server 2008 r2 (domain & workgroup in environment), exchange server configuration, network backup, enterprise configuration for antivirus, server digester recovery, remote access, erp. certifications : microsoft certified professional, certified network engineer , ccna (cisco certified network associate ,cisco certified network professional (ccnp) ,mcse: server infrastructure additional certification : red hat certified engineer (rhce) ,comp tia network+. age limit : 25yrs to 30yrs. min experience : 5 years (preferable for gcc experience) salary : 2500 sr to 3000 sr / negotiable interested candidates can email their cvs at hrd@acs4jobs.com

name: ILF Consulting Engineers
title: Budget & Control Analyst (m/f) - Saudi Arabian National
description: job description as a budget & control analyst, you will play a crucial role in analyzing financial data, developing budgets, monitoring expenses, and providing valuable insights to optimize our company’s financial performance. collaborate with various departments to develop and monitor budgets, ensuring alignment with company goals and objective analyze financial data and prepare reports, forecasts, and projections to support decision-making processes monitor and control expenses, identifying areas for cost optimization and recommending strategies for improved financial efficiency conduct variance analysis to identify deviations from budgeted targets and provide actionable recommendations assist in the development of financial models and scenarios for business planning and forecasting support the preparation of financial statements, presentations, and reports for internal and external stakeholders stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and best practices in budgeting and financial control qualification saudi national location: riyadh, saudi arabia 5 years of work experience bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or a related field. a relevant professional certification (e.g., cma, cpa) is preferred proven experience as a budget analyst, financial analyst, or similar role, with a strong understanding of budgeting principles and financial control processes proficiency in financial modeling, forecasting, and analysis using advanced excel functions familiarity with financial management software and erp systems excellent analytical skills with meticulous attention to detail ability to work independently, manage multiple priorities, and meet deadlines to apply for this position, please submit the following: updated resume highlighting your relevant experience and qualifications a cover letter explaining your interest in the role and how your skills align with the requirements any additional supporting documents or certifications

name: ILF Consulting Engineers
title: Document Controller (m/f) - Saudi Arabian National
description: job description processes incoming and outgoing design submittals and distributing routine correspondence as required collect and register all technical documents such as drawings and blueprints in the company’s system review and update documents for maintenance and quality control ensure that all corporate documents are well checked and submitted on time prior to the documents submission due date updating documents monitoring log ensure that all corporate documents are well checked and submitted on time prior to the documents submission due date archiving company documents and drawings developing company documentation system preparing company works presentation preparing meeting schedules qualification saudi national bsc or equivalent, degree in business administration or related field 2-5 years of experience in similar areas excellent knowledge in data management technical knowledge of the document control systems and processes advanced skills in ms excel, word & powerpoint effective communication skills. being able to express ideas at all levels self-motivated. being able at to work with minimal supervision ability to organize and preserve paper documents

name: IHCC
title: IT support Engineer
description: job description this role would suit an individual who is seeking an exciting new challenge with zeal to learn and implement new technologies in it infrastructure within the scope of it support serve as the principal administrative contact and liaison with it vendors on behalf of the department. maintain & stay up-to-date with data related to recurring invoice of software maintenance, isp etc. along with payments based on the po’s maintain & stay up-to-date with the current hardware and software inventory. coordinate with authorized it vendors to receive quotes based on it requirement coordinate to get the technical and financial review completed of proposals/quotes raise the po in oracle and coordinate with various departments to get items delivered from the approved vendor. act as link between end users and higher-level support perform software testing before releasing to users & work to get the bugs fixed maintain &stay up to date with it investment budget package from various department &coordinate with concern department to raise it requisition on time work with hr to coordinate in planning, arranging and delivering the trainings to the staff in order to improve the skills work to get the user and management feedback on the delivered trainings & take appropriate actions as approved by management coordinate with procurement department to get items delivered from the approved vendor on time. adhere to company policy, procedures and the professional code of ethics. perform other related duties as required comply with it department cyber security strategy experience 8 years qualification bachelor in it engineering / equivalent department/functional area it

name: IDEX Services
title: UI/UX Designer // Full-Stack Developer // Front-End Developer
description: ui/ux designer job description responsibilities gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers illustrate design ideas using storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps design graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs, and widgets build page navigation buttons and search fields develop ui mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look like create original graphic designs (e.g., images, sketches, and tables) prepare and present rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders identify and troubleshoot ux problems (e.g., responsiveness) conduct layout adjustments based on user feedback adhere to style standards on fonts, colors, and images requirements proven work experience as a ui/ux designer or similar role portfolio of design projects up-to-date knowledge of design software like adobe illustrator and photoshop team spirit: strong communication skills to collaborate with various stakeholders good time-management skills bsc in design, computer science, or relevant field. full-stack developer job description responsibilities design, develop, deploy, and maintain secure and scalable web-based applications. support and maintain existing applications and develop new modules as and when required for feature enhancements. adopt best practices in web development, design, testing, code review, version control, documentation, build, deployment, and operations. working closely with the product lead, delivery lead, and other agile team members ensures that the projects' desired results are achieved. keeping the development workflows up to date (e.g., git guidelines, ci / cd). developing front-end website architecture. designing user interactions on web pages. developing back-end website applications. creating servers and database schemas. designing and developing apis. document your work and progress. requirements bsc in computer science or a related field. 1+ years of proven working experience in full-stack web development. well experienced in javascript frameworks, react, angular, and nodejs. experience with database technologies such as mysql, postgresql, and mongodb. web api development and integration using python django. front-end developer job description responsibilities developing the latest user-facing features using react.js designing a modern, highly responsive web-based user interface building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use translating designs and wireframes into high-quality code learn and understand user interactions optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers coordinating with various teams working on distinct layers as a react.js developer, you will be involved from conception to completion with technologically sound and aesthetically impressive projects. requirements proven work experience as a front-end developer. bsc in design, computer science, or relevant field strong proficiency in javascript, including dom manipulation and the javascript object model thorough understanding of react.js and its core principles experience with popular react.js workflows (such as flux or redux) experience with data structure libraries (e.g., immutable.js) experience with restful apis knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as json web token familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements a knack for benchmarking and optimization familiarity with code versioning tools such as git.

name: IBM
title: Backend Engineer
description: introduction at ibm, work is more than a job - it's a calling: to build. to design. to code. to consult. to think along with clients and sell. to make markets. to invent. to collaborate. not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? if so, lets talk. your role and responsibilities software development is critical to the success of ibm and our clients worldwide. at ibm, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. this opportunity is for a new product suite, watsonx, that ibm brought to the market in 2024. we are looking for seasoned professionals who are passionate about data, ai and ml.. what's in it for you: you will work in an innovation driven, collaborative environment to understand requirements, architect, design and implement functionalities / features you will work with customers, understand their requirements and translate then to product features you will work in a agile development environment and be part of large scale scrums you will actively contribute to all phases of software development including development and testing you will experience a culture of continuous learning to aid progression you will develop proof of concepts to establish technical feasibility you will mentor junior members you will get an opportunity to work with various open source products and actively contribute back to their community you will get equal opportunity to work on cloud and software product deployments you will be the pioneers and be part core team to set up and establish this mission sasw_24 required technical and professional expertise strong development experience in java or c++ and object-oriented programming (12+ years) strong development experience with rest api development python and similar languages will be an advantage experience working with linux or unix based os working knowledge in container technologies: kubernetes, docker working knowledge on openshift experience working with automation and integration processes and tools like jenkins. experienced with tools such as github experience working in an agile/scrum-based environment excellent communication skills (verbal and writing) excellent communicator for senior bands team leading and leadership experience influencing skills experience of having worked in global organisations will be an added advantage preferred technical and professional expertise experience with ai & ml technologies experience with data engineering, data governance, data management aws or ibm cloud expertise awareness or past experience in big data technologies, spark, streaming data track record of open source contributions bachelor’s degree or higher in computer science, software engineering, information systems or equivalent about business unitibm software infuses core business operations with intelligence—from machine learning to generative ai—to help make organizations more responsive, productive, and resilient. ibm software helps clients put ai into action now to create real value with trust, speed, and confidence across digital labor, it automation, application modernization, security, and sustainability. critical to this is the ability to make use of all data, because ai is only as good as the data that fuels it. in most organizations data is spread across multiple clouds, on premises, in private datacenters, and at the edge. ibm’s ai and data platform scales and accelerates the impact of ai with trusted data, and provides leading capabilities to train, tune and deploy ai across business. ibm’s hybrid cloud platform is one of the most comprehensive and consistent approach to development, security, and operations across hybrid environments—a flexible foundation for leveraging data, wherever it resides, to extend ai deep into a business. your life @ ibmin a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as ibmers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better. being an ibmer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background. our ibmers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. they are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other ibmers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. the courage our ibmers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to ibm becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do. are you ready to be an ibmer? about ibmibm’s greatest invention is the ibmer. we believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and ai strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the fortune 50 companies relying on the ibm cloud to run their business. at ibm, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world. location statementfor additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application. being you @ ibmibm is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. ibm is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

name: Infinite pl
title: Delivery Manager – GIS
description: as the delivery manager- gis, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing the technical delivery, orchestrating project execution, and ensuring the seamless integration of advanced geospatial solutions. this role requires a seasoned professional with a robust technical background, advanced platform skills, and a proven track record in delivering complex projects. responsibilities: develop and implement comprehensive project plans, encompassing technical requirements, timelines, resource allocation, and risk mitigation strategies. lead and supervise project teams to ensure the successful execution of initiatives within defined scope, budget, and schedule. responsible for ensuring that services provided meet the needs and expectations of the customer. oversee the entire service delivery process, from initial planning and implementation to ongoing support and maintenance, managing resources, and drives service delivery excellence. collaborate with various teams to ensure smooth delivery of services, manage client relationships, and address any issues that arise. provide strong technical leadership to cross-functional teams, including architects, developers, and engineers. collaborate with technical experts to ensure alignment with project objectives, technical best practices, and industry standards. oversee the administration and maintenance of gis applications and tools. ensure high performance and accuracy of gis data and functionalities. manage spatial databases, ensuring data integrity, accuracy, and efficient retrieval. ensure seamless integration of gis with other systems, including application layers and infrastructure components. monitor gis system performance, ensuring compliance with slas and optimal response times for data queries and map rendering. address and resolve complex gis-related issues, providing root cause analysis and implementing long-term solutions. liaise with gis software vendors and data providers for issue resolution, updates, and technical discussions. conduct regular knowledge transfer sessions with relevant teams and contribute to the development of a gis knowledge base. oversee the design and architecture of systems, ensuring scalability, security, and seamless integration with existing infrastructure. manage integration efforts, collaborating with technical teams to deliver cohesive and interoperable solutions. work closely with qa teams to conduct comprehensive testing, identify and resolve issues, and uphold high-quality standards. develop and implement robust testing strategies to ensure the quality, accuracy, and reliability of systems. act as the primary liaison between technical teams and stakeholders, facilitating clear communication, understanding of project goals, and addressing concerns. collaborate with government agencies, partners, and clients to gather requirements and ensure alignment with project objectives. possess advanced skills in utilizing geospatial platforms and technologies relevant to geospatial systems. proficient in geospatial platforms such as esri arcgis, openstreetmap, arcpro mapbox etc. identify, assess, and mitigate potential risks associated with projects, ensuring proactive risk management. resolve issues promptly to minimize disruptions and maintain project momentum. develop and maintain detailed technical documentation, including project plans, architecture diagrams, and implementation guides. provide regular reports on gis operations, including system health, ongoing issues, and project status. maintain comprehensive documentation of gis processes and configurations. requirements: bachelor's or master's degree in a relevant field such as computer science, geomatics, gis, etc. at least 14+ of experience in technical project management, with a focus on geospatial systems and initiatives. proven track record in managing large-scale geospatial projects, including planning, execution, and risk management. strong technical expertise with gis esri (arcgis). familiarity with agile development methodologies and working in a cross functional team. proficiency in utilizing geospatial platforms and technologies. advanced skills in platforms such as esri arcgis, openstreetmap, geoserver, and other industry-standard geospatial tools. preferred certifications: project management professional (pmp) and geographic information systems professional (gisp).

name: IBM
title: Technology Engineer - Client Engineering
description: introduction technology sales at ibm is evolving it's way of working to break beyond boundaries with innovative approaches. preferring to 'show' vs. 'tell', client engineering co-creates with prospective customers, in real-time, on solutions to their hardest business challenges. as a cloud engineer (what we in ibm call a 'technology engineer') within client engineering, you'll be be a key player in a multi-disciplinary team made up of architects, data scientists, designers, developers, and business strategists. the brightest minds collaborating with clients as one team, and contributing to experiential working sessions. the outputs of which produce minimal viable product (mvp), enterprise-scale solutions at lean, start-up speed. excellent onboarding training will set you up for success, whilst ongoing development will continue to advance your career through its upward trajectory. our sales environment is fast-paced and supportive. always part of a team, you'll be surrounded by leaders and colleagues who are always willing to help and be helped – as you support mvps and proofs of concept (poc) that compel clients to invest in ibm's products and services. your role and responsibilities as a technology engineer within ibm client engineering you'll help deliver unique client co-creation experiences to accelerate their transformation. from identification of requirements to technical decisions impacting the business case, you'll lead all aspects of integrated solutions. we're passionate about success. if this role is right for you, then your achievements will mean that your career is flourishing and our clients are thriving. to help ensure this win-win outcome, a 'day-in-the life' of this opportunity may include, but not be limited to: combining contemporary cloud skills (e.g., ai, analytics, devops, devsecops, iac, security, networking and storage etc.,) with deep industry expertise, and an understanding of your dedicated set of clients' businesses. defining and communicating the differentiated value of ibm's technology – technically and commercially. being the overall technical lead for client sessions that include a broad range of public and hybrid cloud technologies - red hat openshift, ibm cloud paks and kubernetes (to name a few!) supporting the solutions architecture plan whilst being a hands-on "builder" in client-facing engagements. advising so that solution architecture includes provisions for security, reliability, and anticipated future needs. required technical and professional expertise demonstrable, hand-on expertise in a wide range of cloud technologies. provable track-record of leading customer-facing, technical solutions teams in a variety of cloud architectures. technical expertise in a cloud-related solution domain such as data / analytics, data science, security, or other cloud native, hybrid, or public-cloud technology. expertise in developing deep, collaborative client relationships at all levels within organisations. deep understanding and demonstrable application of agile best practices. preferred technical and professional expertise experience in architecting /deploying /operating solutions built on aws, azure, ibm cloud, or google cloud. deep solution architect or an it / some public cloud consultant experience. about business unitibm has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. the company’s global markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages ibm’s global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. these country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. by complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, ibm builds deep and broad-based client relationships. this local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. additionally, the global markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that ibm and partners supply. ibm is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces. your life @ ibmin a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as ibmers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better. being an ibmer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background. our ibmers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. they are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other ibmers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. the courage our ibmers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to ibm becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do. are you ready to be an ibmer? about ibmibm’s greatest invention is the ibmer. we believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and ai strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the fortune 50 companies relying on the ibm cloud to run their business. at ibm, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world. location statementfor additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application. being you @ ibmibm is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. ibm is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

name: John Wood Group
title: Senior Process Engineer
description: wood is recruiting for a senior process engineer to work in al-khobar, sa produces basic engineering deliverables such as philosophies, reports, specifications, data sheets, technical requisitions, and others. performs a variety of conventional engineering tasks in line with company practices, procedures and programs. solves problems using a variety of standard methods, applying standard techniques involving only minor innovations of methodology to provide solutions to problems with a limited number of variables participates with drafters, technicians, and others to contribute to project completion coordinates work with other engineers and operating groups to facilitate participation of various organizational units performs tests, research problems through various sources of technical information designs or modifies components and determines the intent of a specification/instruction. makes recommendations on the acceptability of materials supplied and work completed by contractors responsible for studies of limited scope requiring application of prescribed methods. problems involves existing technology and applications, but may involve non-recurring problems. demonstrates judgement in determining the methods to apply to assigned tasks makes limited changes to meet location conditions, new situations or to improve safety, economy, efficiency, or applicability note-taking and active participation in design reviews. review vendor documents under supervision and guidance. establish and maintain effective working relationships and communicate across the project / contract interfaces. engage with inter-discipline community and promote discipline including networking / knowledge sharing builds internal relationships with others outside of own work group or team, particularly with internal customer. consults with other local and divisional sources as required. begins to initiate information exchanges participates as a team member and communicates. information to appropriate parties at the appropriate time bs in chemical engineering with 10 - 15 years of relevant experience in the field basic knowledge of developing h&mb, pfd's, p&id's, msd's ability to perform hydraulic calculations and various equipment sizing. basic knowledge in relief and blowdown calculations ability of developing process simulation wood is a global leader in consulting and engineering, helping to unlock solutions to critical challenges in energy and materials markets. we provide consulting, projects and operations solutions in 60 countries, employing around 35,000 people. www.woodplc.com diversity statement we are an equal opportunity employer that recognises the value of a diverse workforce. all suitably qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment on the basis of objective criteria and without regard to the following (which is a non-exhaustive list): race, colour, age, religion, gender, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status, or other characteristics in accordance with the relevant governing laws.

name: John Wood Group

name: Marn
title: Senior iOS Engineer
description: about marn: marn is a technology company established in 2017. it was acquired by jahez international group in 2023. the company develops point of sale (pos) software integrated with payment services to provide a one-stop solution for businesses in f&b, retail, entertainment, and services. marn grew massively in the past two years and continues to accelerate the growth of its customer base. here at marn, we aspire to become close friends working together towards disrupting the industry. we plan to accomplish our vision & mission via a strong desire to win, embrace mistakes, and make bold moves. we rely on radical candor in our learning to never repeat the same mistakes. we care personally, yet challenge directly. being part of marn, you should expect to make mistakes, be challenged while challenging others, and win big. job purpose: we are looking for a senior ios engineer to join our tech department at marn. as a senior ios engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for our ios platform. you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and test new features, as well as enhance existing functionalities. key responsibilities: design and build advanced applications for the ios platform in swiftui and uikit. collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs. help maintain code quality, organization, and automation. if you are passionate about ios development, have a strong understanding of swift and objective-c, and enjoy working in a collaborative environment, we would love to hear from you. join us at marn and be part of a dynamic team that is dedicated to creating innovative solutions for our users. qualifications: minimum of 5 years of experience in ios app development. proficiency in swift and objective-c programming languages. strong understanding of ios design principles and interface guidelines. experience with restful apis and third-party libraries. ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams. excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. experience with performance and memory tuning tools. knowledge of continuous integration and deployment. experience in realtime syncing technologies (signal r, firebase realtime db, pusher, rabbitmq, webrtc, and mqtt). experience in multipeer and implementing bluetooth integrations. experience in core data. compensation and benefits: competitive monthly salary. good health insurance. 21 working-days annual vacation.

description: you will join a team of highly qualified team engineers to continue the innovation and development of our product which uses machine learning & big data technologies to analyze content from several data sources. as a backend developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the backend systems of lucidya's product. you will work with technologies such as redis, postgres, and cassandra, and develop apis using python and ruby on rails. you will work directly under the engineering manager in an agile yet demanding environment. we expect you to be a fast learner and quickly adapt to the technologies mentioned above. lucidya offers a result-driven, fun, and dynamic environment full of challenges. we are looking for talented candidates with strong programming skills. key tasks & responsibilities rapidly develop scalable, flexible, and high-performance backend systems. design, develop, test, deploy, maintain, and improve software (backends and databases, in particular). manage individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables. handle devops tasks. contribute to the growth of lucidya through interviewing, onboarding, or other recruitment efforts. requirements ba/bs or master's degree in computer science, software engineering, it or equivalent practical experience. at least 3 years of experience in software development. strong knowledge of sql and nosql databases such as redis, postgres or cassandra. fluency in python or ruby on rails. knowledge of web servers and web application servers (e.g., apache, jetty, tomcat, iis). knowledge of code repositories like git. ability to multitask and adapt to shifting priorities, demands, and tight timelines. database design skills. experience in building high-quality code. excellent organizational skills and proven analytical, planning, and problem-solving abilities. full-stack development with a background in reactjs is a plus.

off, carry out technical bid evaluations and vendor document reviews identify issues, obtains relevant information, relate and compare data from different sources and identify alternative solutions listen and respond appropriately to others, convey information clearly and concisely to groups or individuals either verbally or in writing take action consistent with available facts, constraints and anticipated risks / consequences. identify problems, determines possible solution, and actively works to resolve issues guide and empower others to develop new skills or knowledge that will enhance their work bachelor’s degree in instrumentation and control engineering or similar minimum of 20 years instrumentation experience minimum of 5 years at a senior level recent lead of a project in excess of 50k man-hours. previous feed and epc experience is essential knowledge in smart plant instrumentation knowledge of saudi aramco standards is an advantage though not mandatory wood is a global leader in consulting and engineering, helping to unlock solutions to critical challenges in energy and materials markets. we provide consulting, projects and operations solutions in 60 countries, employing around 35,000 people. www.woodplc.com diversity statement we are an equal opportunity employer that recognises the value of a diverse workforce. all suitably qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment on the basis of objective criteria and without regard to the following (which is a non-exhaustive list): race, colour, age, religion, gender, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veteran status, or other characteristics in accordance with the relevant governing laws.

name: KBR
title: Sr. Telecommunication Engineer (Saudi National)
description: title: sr. telecommunication engineer (saudi national) kbr-amcde is a leading engineering and project management services company in saudi arabia that provides feed, detailed design, procurement and project management services to the onshore and offshore oil and gas markets. due to the recent award of various prestigious project, we have exciting new opportunities for ksa national to join the team. at kbr-amcde you will be exposed to state-of-the-art technology, industry leading design and project management practice while delivering meaningful projects. exposure to successful experienced co-workers, industry best practices, advanced technology and challenging projects makes kbr-amcde the ideal company providing opportunities for career growth and development. job description: responsible for the design, specification and services related to communication systems, such as satellite, line of sight, fiber optic, phone, public address systems and the transmission of data from supervisory control and data acquisition system. under general supervision, performs all conventional aspects of the functional area subject matter. devises new approaches to problems encountered. plans, schedules, and conducts work requiring judgment in the independent evaluation, selection, and adaptation of engineering techniques, procedures, and criteria. performs work which involves conventional engineering practice but may include a variety of complex features such as conflicting design requirements, unsuitability of conventional materials, and difficult coordination requirements. provides technical guidance to designers and less experienced engineers. job tasks, correctly performed, impact indirectly on cost containment, efficiency, profitability or operations. requirements: undergraduate degree in engineering minimum of 5 years of related experience saudi national
